pages.title: Giant Clams
pages.text: Giant Clams encompass the largest bivalve molluscs. $(br2)They have heavy shells, fluted with 4 to 6 folds, and feature a brightly coloured mantle, due to symbiotic photosynthetic algae. $(br2)Giant Clams can be found in shallow waters of coral reefs in warm/lukewarm oceans.
